data.oai_dc:dc: Planktonic foraminifera assemblages in NE Atlantic and Alboran Sea surface sediments
Most of the data was integrated in the planktonic foraminifera modern analog data bases used by Salgueiro et al. (2010) and Salgueiro et al. (2014) for the paleo-climate reconstructions.

221, 224, 226, 282, 284, 293, 64PE225, 64PE225MC2-02, 64PE225MC3-03, 747, Alboran Sea, Arutyunov, Beella digitata, Bonjardim, Counting >150 µm fraction, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Event label,
